Name: Hamster Logic 3D
About the game: Do your friends often tell you that you act like a hamster? Now you have the chance to prove that not only do you act like a hamster, but you can also think like one! You play as a hamster stuck in a strange world full of odd shapes and no food as far as the eye can see. You just want to get home to your sweet hamster cage and your delicious sunflower seeds, but these shapes will not take no for an answer. They continually block your way forward. However, with your amazing hamster brain, you quickly figure out that all these shapes have their own unique function. Some hurt a whole lot, which is not a good thing, but others can actually help you move forward! You just have to do a bit of thinking. Time to use your hamster logic! Features: A cute hamster running in a ball. Puzzles that make you think. Engaging gameplay Note: 10% of the net revenue earned from this game goes to Blue Cross (UK).
